name: Monads
description: A fantasy-themed turn-based tactical puzzle game where you can enjoy interesting intellectual challenges and magnificent stories without repeating!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or higher Processor: Any processor w/ SSE2 instruction set support Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Any graphic processor w/ DirectX 11.1 support DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8 or higher Processor: Any processor w/ SSE2 instruction set support Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Any graphic processor w/ DirectX 11.1 support DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
